snippet.title: Steamworld Build Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Summer Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

The Steamworld universe is expanding once again. Steamworld Build is a citybuilder from Thunderful where you develop a mining town to dig up lost technology. A new trailer revealed that Steamworld Build is coming to PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation and Xbox in 2023.

#FutureGamesShow #FGS
